page.title: 12Religion:Trebullett Chapel
page.content: {St.Lawrence chapel}in Trebullett was built in 1871 for Â£558 4s 11d.The Sunday School was erected in 1810.In 1871 when it opened there were 35 children attending,in 1921 there were 43 children,in 1971 there were 60 children.In 1818 more land was bought for Â£21.The car park was opened on the 7th March 1951.Electricity was installed in 1959.Heating was also installed in 1966.Prayer meetings were held at Higher Larrick and also at a house at Trebullett which is now called Victoria Cottage.More room was bought for dead people to be buried.It cost Â£10.At the opening service Rev.Gervase Smith preached.The chapel hasn't changed much since it was built.At the chapel there are some club activities such as Junior club and Playgroup.
